Field.name: EquipmentInitial
Field.comment: Prefix or alphabetic part of an equipment unit's identifying number

Field.name: EquipmentNumber
Field.comment: Sequencing or serial part of an equipment unit's identifying number (pure numeric form for equipment number is preferred)

Field.name: EquipmentType
Field.comment: Code identifying equipment type

Field.name: BillOfLadingWaybillNumber
Field.comment: Identification number assigned to the shipment by the carrier or consolidator

Field.name: TypeOfServiceCode
Field.comment: Code specifying extent of transportation service requested

Field.name: HazardousMaterialCodeQualifier
Field.comment: Code which qualifies the Hazardous Material Class Code (209)

Field.name: HazardousMaterialClassCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the kind of hazard for a material

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: LocationIdentifier
Field.comment: Code which identifies a specific location

Field.name: Quantity
Field.comment: Numeric value of quantity

Field.name: PackagingCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of packaging; Part 1: Packaging Form, Part 2: Packaging Material; if the Data Element is used, then Part 1 is always required

Field.name: DispositionCode1
Field.comment: Code advising the carrier or port authority about postings to a bill of lading

Field.name: DispositionCode2
Field.comment: Code advising the carrier or port authority about postings to a bill of lading

Field.name: DispositionCode3
Field.comment: Code advising the carrier or port authority about postings to a bill of lading

Field.name: RateClassCode1
Field.comment: Code identifying specifically designated class of goods; Note: For international air shipments, see IATA Resolution 600k

Field.name: RateValueQualifier1
Field.comment: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value

Field.name: Rate1
Field.comment: Rate expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: RateClassCode2
Field.comment: Code identifying specifically designated class of goods; Note: For international air shipments, see IATA Resolution 600k

Field.name: RateValueQualifier2
Field.comment: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value

Field.name: Rate2
Field.comment: Rate expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: RateClassCode3
Field.comment: Code identifying specifically designated class of goods; Note: For international air shipments, see IATA Resolution 600k

Field.name: RateValueQualifier3
Field.comment: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value

Field.name: Rate3
Field.comment: Rate expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified

Field.name: DateTimeQualifier
Field.comment: Code specifying type of date or time, or both date and time

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ShipmentStatusCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the status of a shipment

Field.name: StandardCarrierAlphaCode
Field.comment: Standard Carrier Alpha Code

Field.name: ReferenceIdentificationQualifier1
Field.comment: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification1
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier

Field.name: ReferenceIdentificationQualifier2
Field.comment: Code qualifying the Reference Identification

Field.name: ReferenceIdentification2
Field.comment: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier
